synopsis: Reviews are mixed-positive overall. Many users report reduced hair fall after several washes and note smoother, shinier, more manageable hair. Fragrance is often described as mild or pleasant, and the formula feels gentle for frequent use. Recurring critiques include low lather and limited cleansing on oiled hair; some also mention dryness or frizz and occasional packaging issues, with a few seeing no change.
key_takeaways: Many report noticeable hair fall reduction after consistent use for weeks.
Leaves hair feeling smoother, softer, and more manageable, with added shine.
Fragrance described as mild to pleasant; suitable for frequent washing.
Lathering and cleansing can be challenging, especially on heavily oiled hair.
